title: Ep. 844 It’s On!
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the biggest surprises in this critical Election Day period. I also address the ramifications of a divided government and the importance of gubernatorial races to you. Finally, I address some criticisms of my George Papadopoulos interview. 
 
News Picks:
Which Senate seats could flip?
 
A host of reasons to vote for Republicans.
 
The ten key races to watch.
 
It all comes down to Florida. 
 
More people died from drug overdoses than from car accidents in 2017.
 
Here’s a detailed transcript of my interview with George Papadopoulos.
 
Police unions and police officers often clash when it comes to politics.
 
Socialists want to limit your ability to escape their high-tax dreams.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

I also address the ramifications of a divided government and the importance of gubernatorial races to you. Finally, I address some criticisms of my George Papadopoulos interview.    News Picks: Which Senate seats could flip?   A host of reasons to vote for Republicans.   The ten key races to watch.   It all comes down to Florida.    More people died from drug overdoses than from car accidents in 2017.   Here’s a detailed transcript of my interview with George Papadopoulos.   Police unions and police officers often clash when it comes to politics.   Socialists want to limit your ability to escape their high-tax dreams.   Copyright CRTV.
